property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the ViewPreference (a Application or Document).

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: pointsPerInch
property.shortdesc: The number of points per inch, typically 72. (Range: 60 to 80)

property.name: horizontalCustomPoints
property.shortdesc: The distance (in points) between major tick marks on the horizontal ruler. (Range: 4 to 256) Valid only when horizontal measurement units is custom.

property.name: verticalCustomPoints
property.shortdesc: The distance (in points) between major tick marks on the vertical ruler. (Range: 4 to 256) Valid only when vertical measurement units is custom.

property.name: strokeMeasurementUnits
property.shortdesc: The measurement unit for stroke measurements.

property.name: guideSnaptoZone
property.shortdesc: The range (in pixels) within which an object snaps to guides. (Range: 1 to 36) Note: Snapping occurs only when guides are shown.

property.name: cursorKeyIncrement
property.shortdesc: The distance to move a specified object when an arrow key is pressed. (Range depends on the measurement unit. For points: 0.001 to 100; picas: 0p0.001 to 8p4; mm: 0 to 35.278; cm: 0 to 3.5278; inches: 0 to 1.3889; ciceros: 0c0.001 to 7c9.839)

property.name: horizontalMeasurementUnits
property.shortdesc: The measurement unit for the horizontal ruler and other horizontally-measured spaces such as grid columns, horizontal offsets, column gutters, or others.

property.name: verticalMeasurementUnits
property.shortdesc: The measurement unit for the vertical ruler and other vertically-measured spaces such as grid rows, vertical offsets, row heights, or others.

property.name: rulerOrigin
property.shortdesc: The default zero point at the intersection of the vertical and horizontal rulers and the scope of the horizontal ruler.

property.name: showRulers
property.shortdesc: If true, displays the horizontal and vertical rulers.

property.name: showFrameEdges
property.shortdesc: If true, displays borders of unselected frames and the diagonal lines in empty unselected frames.

property.name: typographicMeasurementUnits
property.shortdesc: The measurement units for typography.

property.name: textSizeMeasurementUnits
property.shortdesc: The measurement unit for text size measurements.

property.name: printDialogMeasurementUnits
property.shortdesc: The measurement unit for the print dialog.

property.name: showNotes
property.shortdesc: If true, notes are displayed.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ViewPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
